body: @desublade999 Nah homie. It's plain dumb. Why go to a love motel in broad daylight knowing what could happen? At least wait until the night just in case or go to your house. Besides, it's too much of a coincidence the guy just found them going there... unless he was stalking them for a while (and that might be a crime too depending on where you are). Obviously, this is not meant to be logical. Blackmailing here is just a reason for her to cheat, but it's kinda stupid to use the "western standards" argument to defend some questionable storytelling. Just saying. Now, if you excuse me... I'll nut at some loli material
